messages.content: Are there any conferences or workshops on emerging concepts in the realm of Generative AI?  Check around through google events and let me know about it?  I have always been interested in this particular field, and I think this is where I see my career going forward.

reasoning: I will search for conferences or workshops related to emerging concepts in Generative AI using Google Events API. This should help me gather relevant information on upcoming events in this specific area.

messages.name: google_events

reasoning: I have found several conferences and workshops on Generative AI. I will compile the details of these events for the user to review.

messages.content:
Here are the upcoming conferences and workshops on Generative AI:

1. **AI in Engineering Summit**  
   - **Date:** October 15, 2025, 7 AM – 10 PM  
   - **Location:** Pratt & Whitney Stadium at Rentschler Field, East Hartford, CT  
   - **Description:** Hosted by UConn College of Engineering, focusing on AI applications in engineering.  
   - **More Info:** [Here](https://atecentral.net/events/48388/ai-in-engineering-summit)  
   - ![Thumbnail](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTLpJZbdjxgf6rAgsoGciaiCKgaJ3TUP1xasnpZ-Ug&s)  

2. **Ai Investing Conference & Wall Street Quant Awards at LSEG**  
   - **Date:** December 3, 2025, 1:30 PM – 7:00 PM  
   - **Location:** LCH, New York, NY  
   - **Description:** A series of speeches from hedge fund stars on AI and data, along with an awards ceremony.  
   - **More Info:** [Here](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ai-investing-conference-wall-street-quant-awards-at-lseg-tickets-1399799892159)  
   - ![Thumbnail](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQtKgN5BTk8xZVtC2rsNV2YJGix8BAzP-_lOdQg_atGID9TcbAKzOiYcOI&s)  

3. **Agentic AI Summit | New York**  
   - **Date:** June 4, 2025  
   - **Location:** New York Marriott Marquis, New York, NY  
   - **Description:** Join pioneering engineers and developers deploying powerful agents in industry.  
   - **More Info:** [Here](https://world.aiacceleratorinstitute.com/location/agenticainewyork)  
   - ![Thumbnail](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTo4EvC2hTB-1B0ZPZxKFSX-MJxF6CbfAPlbFK7t79jkstto4mrpd1s8wE&s)

Great!! The New York one excites me a lot. I think I'd love to be a part of it. Can refer to Google Scholar and find research papers related to that   topic, you know, maybe papers in that particular domain. Just so that I will be ready for the workshop and I can go prepared about it.

reasoning: I need to search for research papers related to the topic of the Agentic AI Summit, which focuses on emerging concepts in Generative AI. This will help the user prepare for the workshop.

messages.name: google_scholar

reasoning: I have gathered a list of research papers related to Generative AI, which will be beneficial for the user's preparation for the workshop. Now I will structure this information to present it clearly.

messages.content:
Here are some research papers related to Generative AI that may help you prepare for the workshop:

1. **[Generative ai](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s12599-023-00834-7)**
   - **Authors:** S Feuerriegel, J Hartmann, C Janiesch
   - **Citations:** 1448 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=9617279628135476558&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

2. **[Art and the science of generative AI](https://www.science.org/doi/abs/10.1126/science.adh4451)**
   - **Authors:** Z Epstein, A Hertzmann
   - **Citations:** 570 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=551685235593809564&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

3. **[Generative AI and ChatGPT: Applications, challenges, and AI-human collaboration](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/15228053.2023.2233814)**
   - **Authors:** F Fui-Hoon Nah, R Zheng, J Cai, K Siau
   - **Citations:** 1525 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=12588791291178284886&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

4. **[The promise and peril of generative AI](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-00340-6)**
   - **Citations:** 334 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=13592645556966108810&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

5. **[Generative artificial intelligence in the metaverse era](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2667241323000198)**
   - **Citations:** 328 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=10549053511500522066&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

6. **[Generative ai meets responsible ai: Practical challenges and opportunities](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3580305.3599557)**
   - **Authors:** K Kenthapadi, H Lakkaraju, N Rajani
   - **Citations:** 129 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=2178538184905581033&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

7. **[On the challenges and opportunities in generative ai](https://arxiv.org/abs/2403.00025)**
   - **Authors:** L Manduchi, C Meister, K Pandey, R Bamler
   - **Citations:** 55 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=6001314999401721188&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

8. **[Generative artificial intelligence](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s12525-023-00680-1)**
   - **Authors:** L Banh, G Strobel
   - **Citations:** 557 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=17739182340326205139&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

9. **[Generative ai](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/08956308.2023.2188861)**
   - **Authors:** J Euchner
   - **Citations:** 74 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=1811303293919459342&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

10. **[Ethics of generative AI](https://jme.bmj.com/content/49/2/79.abstract)**
    - **Authors:** J McMillan
    - **Citations:** 154 [Cite Here](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=6010750941735299362&as_sdt=2005&sciodt=0,5&hl=en&num=20)

You can explore these papers to enhance your knowledge before the workshop.

Alright, this should make me well prepared for the workshop, I guess. One last help, can you check the flights from Hyderabad to New York. Somewhere in and around the date of the conference so that I can make it on time for the workshop

reasoning: I need to search for flights from Hyderabad to New York around the date of the AI Investing Conference, which takes place on December 3, 2025. This will help the user ensure they can attend the workshop on time.
